content: अब्ज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अप्सु जायते, जण्-ड] Born in or produced from water <ls>Ms. 5. 112</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 100</ls> --ब्जः {@--1@} The conch ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also). {@--2@} The moon. {@--3@} Camphor. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (निचुल). {@--5@} Dhanvantari, physician of the gods, said to be produced at the churning of the ocean along with other jewels. --ब्जं {@--1@} A lotus. {@--2@} One thousand millions.
